issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
The cdatasection node should be translated into the xml tag escaped code:
cdata content
but rather it's parsed incorrectly into the following code:
]]>
In the browser it only shows "]]>" , undesired result.
fields.summary: The Titanium.XML.CDATASection is not being parsed into the XML correctly when calling Ti.XML.serializeToString on the dom object
